title: Do something about cho gath
body: He builds full tank and his W literally demolishes everyone.

replies.body: If he's fed it's the same as any other tank. Besides everything accept his ult is a skill shot so you only have to dodge.
He had 42 ap and he used his w on me and had 200 damage
That's fine. Your ADC should position better, heals should be used, shields, speed ups whatever is at your disposal.

That's not so bad. I bet you were also 4 levels behind him and had zero magic resist. 

200 damage on a 13 second cooldown and you're complaining about that

a small tip, yasuo is not a good champion against cho, its a terrible match up.

you need to be playing someone with some range and some mobility. i personally like playing {{champion:6}} against him when ive had to vs him top, start with {{item:3070}} , then build{{item:3071}}, then build {{item:3142}} or {{item:3036}} or {{item:3812}}  up to you, finish off your boots and manamune, i would go merc treads and with 2 ms quints i get just abit over 400 ms and if you build tri force about 430, then depending on team comp 2 hp and def/mr items or ga and triforce.
I was actually mid lane but then my kayle was threatening to feed if she didn't get mid so I had to go top even though I already locked in yasuo,
I've never had any issues with Cho personally.
his r true damage mate, true damage = GG ADC
